price: Bazabonamo ibyo bashaka byose, kandi iwacu hari n’inyongera (yo kubona Allah imbonankubone).
arabic: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيۡنَا مَزِيدٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: lahum mā yashāūna fīhā waladaynā mazīdun
